reviews.title: It was clean and in a good area of town
reviews.text: I was worried about staying here after reading the prior review, but the town was well booked and it was last minute so I really didnt have a choice. When we arrived at our room, I was pleasantly surprised to a clean acceptable room. The walls were a little bit thin, we could hear people outside walking by, but not a real problem. The walls didn't have any pictures, but we were just there to sleep. The pool/spa was acceptable, it looked like it could use a cleaning, but this is a Comfort Inn, not a Hyatt. We were there to sleep and go about our day. It ended up being a nice clean room w/ fast maid service the following day. We were not expecting a kitchenette, but had a fridge and a microwave, so that was a nice addition. They also had a complimentary breakfast each morning with a nice selection of breakfast foods including freshly made waffles. Good place to stay on a budget.

reviews.title: Disappointing hotel
reviews.text: We can normally rely on a Comfort Inn to deliver a satisfactory product, unfortunately this one did not. We wanted a couple of nights to relax after much travelling. It advertised an outdoor pool and spa which we intended to use.

We stayed one night for two double, non-smoking room. We paid $62 a night including taxes. The room had smells of tabacco and liquor. Breakfast room had minimal food and no air circulation in a hot day. Will not stay here again.
reviews.title: Not so good...

reviews.text: I needed a place to stay and saw the Super 8 from the freeway. The lady at the front desk was very nice and check in was quick. The room was very clean and comfortable. It was also very quiet so I slept well. I was very happy with this hotel and would recommend it if you just need a nice place to sleep and shower. Some people expect a full resort for their rate but hey, it's a Super 8, not the Hilton. The other lady at checkout was also very nice. No problems here!
reviews.title: Very nice!

reviews.text: Unclean and had to call police. Front desk clerk supposedly uses cameras for security of property. Clerk never answers phone. Someone tried to kick in our door 2 hours after check in. When we finally got a hold of clerk all he could say is, 'what do you want me to do about it?' We checked out and demanded a refund! Of which we got!
reviews.title: Horrible!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Needed a night on the highway, good rooms, reasonable rate, usual small poor selection breakfast seen at most Super 8's. If want to sleep and shower stay here, this is not a resort!
reviews.title: LIke most Super 8, good for a night

reviews.text: We stayed at the Super 8 on a drive between San Francisco and San Diego. All we wanted was a place to sleep for the night.
reviews.title: A Reasobable Highway Stop
